delete-app: Are you sure you want to delete this application?
delete-procedure: Are you sure you want to delete this procedure?
fill-field: Please fill out the fields below, then click
total-procedures: Total number of procedures selected to review
total-applications: Total number of applications selected to review
helper-email: The review request will be sent to this email address
helper-user: The review request will be sent to this user
body-block: Are you sure you want to block {{user}}?
body-unblock: Are you sure you want to unblock {{user}}?
body-edit: Add or remove user roles. If no role is checked, the user will be "Guest"
body-add: Please fill in all required fields, then click on {{action}}. If no role is checked, the user will be "Guest"
confirm-close-upload: Are you sure you want to close the upload? Any modification isn't allowed after closing it.
confirm-close-request: Are you sure you want to go to the next step? Any modification isn't allowed after closing it.
